%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.label: Allegations
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.text:
Is there a non-accidental or suspicious injury?

%NonAccidental%

Is there a death of a child due to abuse and another child in the home? (automatic 24-hour)

%DeathOfAChild%

Is the injury severe? (automatic 24-hour)

%IsItSevere%

Is there other injury? (other than very minor, unless child is under 1 year old)

%OtherInjuryOtherThanVeryMinor%

Is there prior death of a child due to abuse and a new child, of any age, in the home?

%PriorDeath%

Was it a caregiver action that likely caused or will cause injury? (other than very minor unless child is under 1 year old)

%CaregiverAction%

Is medical care currently required due to alleged abuse?

%MedicalCareRequiredDuetoAbuse%

Is the caregiver’s behavior alleged to be dangerous or threatening to child’s health or safety? (reasonable person standard)

%CaregiversBehaviorAllegedToBeDangerousOrThreatening%

Is there allegation of physical injury to non-mobile child or any child under age 2 (or capability equivalent)?

%AllegationOfPhysicalInjuryToNonMobileChild%

Is there a non-perpetrating caregiver aware of the alleged abuse who is demonstrating a response that is appropriate and protective of the child?

%IsThereNonperpetratingCaregiverOfAllegedAbuseTwo%

Is child vulnerable or fearful?

%ChildIsFearful%

Is there prior history of physical abuse?

%ThereIsPriorHistoryOfPhysicalAbuse%

Is there current concern that domestic violence will impact the safety of the child within the next 10 days?

%ThereIsCurrentConcernThatDomesticViolenceWillImpactSafety10Days%
